entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
